name: addPost
description: Adds a new post with the provided title and content.

name: getMessages
description: Fetches messages both sent and received for the user. It retrieves messages from the database, formats the results, and returns them as a JSON object.

name: getPosts
description: Fetches all posts made by any user.

name: sendMessage
description: Sends a message to the specified receiver using the provided content.

receiver_id.description: The identifier of the message receiver.

content.description: The content of the message to be sent.

name: addTicket
description: Creates a new ticket with the provided email, department, and detail.

mail.description: The email of the user submitting the ticket.

department.description: The department to which the ticket is related.

detail.description: A detailed description of the issue or query.
